name: Breakout Birdie!
description:
Bounce your birdie ball through 48 levels of colorful blocks and stubborn bosses in this block-bashing breakout-style game! Take aim at seven different block types and a bevy of flying and diving bug and bird bosses! Hit bombs to set off chain explosions! Catch golden power-ups to temporarily improve your birdie and paddle, but avoid red power-ups or risk losing control of a speeding birdie or finding yourself flying blind!

GAMEPLAY
Slide your finger left and right to move the paddle, and lift your finger to launch the birdie ball. Bounce the ball off the paddle and into blocks and bosses, but don’t let it hit the ground! Catch falling power-ups using the paddle to gain extra lives, a second birdie ball, a bigger paddle, and many more!
For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
* A hilarious block-bashing birdie bonanza!
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Seven block types including block-blasting bombs!
* Nine power-ups to enhance your abilities!
* 48 unique levels to unlock and master!
* Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
* Bright and bubbly background tunes!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
